item.title: Roku's Streaming Stick 4K hits a new low of $25, plus the rest of the week's best tech deals
item.description: Roku’s Streaming Stick 4K hits a new low of $25, plus the rest of the week’s best tech deals Black Friday doesn't officially arrive for a few more weeks, but we're already starting to see retailers run early holiday sales on several gadgets we recommend.
